summary: iavf: schedule watchdog immediately when changing primary MAC
details:
iavf: schedule watchdog immediately when changing primary MAC

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit 122d3a0ee454ac68b75834c9282fb30da3a675b1, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit a3e839d539e0ecfea0f95b8cbaac738a5e24afb5. For more details please see the references link.
